sensorthings.components.datastreams package

Submodules

sensorthings.components.datastreams.engine module

class sensorthings.components.datastreams.engine.DatastreamBaseEngine

Bases: object

Abstract base class for handling Datastreams.

This class defines the required methods for managing datastreams. These methods must be implemented to allow the SensorThings API to interface with an underlying database.

abstract create_datastream(datastream)

Create a new datastream.

Parameters:

datastream (Any) – The datastream object to create.

Returns:

The ID of the newly created datastream.

Return type:

str

abstract delete_datastream(datastream_id)

Delete an existing datastream.

Parameters:

datastream_id (str) – The ID of the datastream to delete.

Return type:

None

abstract get_datastreams(datastream_ids=None, observed_property_ids=None, sensor_ids=None, thing_ids=None, pagination=None, ordering=None, filters=None, expanded=False)

Retrieve datastreams based on the given criteria.

Parameters:

  • datastream_ids (List[str], optional) – List of datastream IDs to filter by.

  • observed_property_ids (List[str], optional) – List of observed property IDs to filter by.

  • sensor_ids (List[str], optional) – List of sensor IDs to filter by.

  • thing_ids (List[str], optional) – List of thing IDs to filter by.

  • pagination (dict, optional) – Pagination options.

  • ordering (dict, optional) – Ordering options.

  • filters (dict, optional) – Additional filtering options.

  • expanded (bool, optional) – Whether to include expanded related entities.

Returns:

A tuple containing a dictionary of datastreams and the total count.

Return type:

tuple

abstract update_datastream(datastream_id, datastream)

Update an existing datastream.

Parameters:

  • datastream_id (str) – The ID of the datastream to update.

  • datastream (Any) – The updated datastream object.

Return type:

None

sensorthings.components.datastreams.schemas module

class sensorthings.components.datastreams.schemas.Datastream(**data)

Bases: BaseComponent, DatastreamFields, DatastreamRelations

A schema representing a datastream.

This class combines the fields and relations of a datastream, and extends the BaseComponent class.

class sensorthings.components.datastreams.schemas.DatastreamFields(**data)

Bases: Schema

A schema representing the fields of a datastream.

name

The name of the datastream.

Type:

str

description

The description of the datastream.

Type:

str

unit_of_measurement

The unit of measurement used by the datastream.

Type:

UnitOfMeasurement

observation_type

The type of observation conducted by the datastream.

Type:

observationTypes

observed_area

The geographical area observed by the datastream.

Type:

dict, optional

phenomenon_time

The time period during which the phenomenon was observed.

Type:

Union[ISOTimeString, ISOIntervalString, None], optional

result_time

The time when the result was generated.

Type:

Union[ISOTimeString, ISOIntervalString, None], optional

properties

Additional properties of the datastream.

Type:

dict, optional

Bases: Schema

‘Thing’

‘Sensor’

‘ObservedProperty’
